faq.question: 诊所营业时间
faq.answer:
我们的营业时间是：

🕒 周一至周六：9:00AM - 1:00PM

📞 紧急情况请拨打：808-528-7177

faq.question: 诊所地址和交通
faq.answer:
📍 主诊所地址：1650 LILIHA ST, SUITE 208, HONOLULU
📍 Aiea 分部：98-211 Pali Momi St, Suite 604, AIEA

✅ 免费停车
🗺️ 导航搜索：AcuTherapy Clinics

faq.question: 如何预约
faq.answer:
预约方式：
📞 电话：808-528-7177
🌐 在线预约：https://acutherapy.janeapp.com/

预约时请提供姓名、联系方式、期望时间与症状描述。

faq.question: 主要服务项目
faq.answer: 🏥 针灸、中医调理、医用按摩、拔罐、刮痧、电针与康复训练。

faq.question: 支付方式
faq.answer:
💳 现金、信用卡/借记卡、Apple Pay。
🏥 保险：HMSA, UHA, HMAA, TriWest, Medicare（部分项目）。

faq.question: 紧急情况联系
faq.answer: 🚨 如遇胸痛、呼吸困难、突发剧痛等，请立即拨打 911 或前往最近急诊室。本诊所不提供 24 小时急诊服务。

faq.question: 首次就诊须知
faq.answer: 请携带身份证、医保卡（如有）、既往病历；提前 15 分钟到达并填写信息表，医生将详细了解病史。

faq.question: 医生团队
faq.answer:
👨‍⚕️ Dr. David Cai — 30+ 年临床经验
👩‍⚕️ Dr. Yeo — 内科与压力管理
👨‍⚕️ Dr. Wong — 运动损伤与康复

faq.question: 健康体检
faq.answer: 我们提供基础健康评估、姿势分析及生活方式指导，帮助制定个性化调理方案。

faq_en.title: 🤔 Does acupuncture hurt?
faq_en.payload: Most people feel little or no pain. You may notice a brief, mild sensation when the sterile, single-use needle is inserted.

faq_en.title: 🛡️ Is acupuncture safe?
faq_en.payload: Yes — when performed by a licensed practitioner. We use sterile, single-use, disposable needles and follow strict hygiene protocols.

faq_en.title: 📆 How many sessions will I need?
faq_en.payload: It depends on your condition, severity, and how your body responds. Some feel relief after one session; others may need a series. Your acupuncturist will create a personalized plan.

faq_en.title: 📝 What should I do before my appointment?
faq_en.payload: Eat a light meal, wear loose clothing, and arrive a few minutes early so you can relax before treatment.

faq_en.title: ⏱️ How long is a typical session?
faq_en.payload: The first visit usually lasts 45–60 minutes, including consultation and treatment. Follow-up visits are typically 30–45 minutes.

faq_en.title: 💳 Can I use my insurance?
faq_en.payload: Many insurance plans cover acupuncture for certain conditions. We can help verify your coverage and explain your benefits before your first appointment.

faq_en.title: ⚠️ Are there any side effects?
faq_en.payload: Minor bruising, light bleeding, or temporary soreness at a needle site can happen but usually resolve quickly.

faq_en.title: ➕ Can I combine acupuncture with other treatments or medications?
faq_en.payload: Yes — acupuncture is often used alongside conventional medicine, physical therapy, or chiropractic care. Please inform your acupuncturist about any treatments or medications you’re taking.

faq_en.title: 😌 What if I’m afraid of needles?
faq_en.payload: Our practitioners are gentle and explain each step. Many people who were nervous at first end up finding sessions relaxing.
